title: No daily missions...
body:
Hi all.
My mate is getting all his daily missions. Win of the day etc etc.
I don't get any. Got some when i started playing 3 weeks ago. Nothing since.. 
What to do here?

replies.body: Hey there! Per our [BE/XP Breakdown guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752824), your first win of the day mission will become available at level 15.  1 more to go!
